name: ipfs.dnp.dappnode.eth
description: Dappnode package responsible for providing IPFS connectivity (go-ipfs v0.4.20)
changelog: Brief summary of the most relevant changes that the user must known before installing

warnings.onInstall: You must set the PASSWORD ENV before installing the DNP in order for the setup to work correctly.
warnings.onUpdate: Your VPN connection will be lost when the VPN finalizes updating. Leave 1-2 minutes after executing the update and then reconnect and refresh this site.
warnings.onReset: You MUST properly close your open channels before reseting this DNP or you may lose your funds.
warnings.onRemove: You MUST properly close your open channels before stopping this DNP or you may lose your funds.

updateAlerts.message: Major update to OpenVPN: This update breaks compatibility with the last VPN version. Please read the migration guide at: https://migration020.dappnode.io
